title: Everlong
description: When love is a matter of life and death, it's not about losing your heart, but saving itOn a bitterly cold New Year's Eve, seventeen-year-old Evie Anderson jumps from the Old Bridge to her death.Seeing her fall, Josh Winters plunges into the river to save her.But Josh is the Angel of Death sent to collect her soul, and saving Evie is against the rules.As their worlds collide, they must conquer their demons, in the battle to survive.With Death standing between them, can love triumph as they fight for their lives?
author: Angela Nock
